description:
Large one bedroom on East 73rd street in  heart of the Upper East Side, one block from 2nd ave subway. Apartment is large and fully furnished. It has living room with couch ,  full kitchen. Full size bed, with comfy mattress,  and clean bathroom. Apple TV is avail.  Wifi,linens, towels, toiletries provided. Only 7 min to times sq , only 6 blocks to central park and museum mile!  We offer early check in and late check out!!!!

Im happy to help with any questions and am always easily available.
name: Large Apt - Best Price- Great Loc!!
review: Great value ! Hillel was the perfect host. Warm and very useful. If you don't mind the bare minimum, the apartment is perfect. Nice bed, big enough, near a subway station... I recommend it !
